author: hwright
msg: Only open the wc admin area once in the case of a wc->wc copy.  Previously, we
had been opening the same destination directory several times when doing a
(do_wc_to_wc_copies):  Move the wc open and close calls outside of the copy

author: blair
msg: Using svnmerge.py, when init'ing a directory, check if the source of
merges is actually a branch from the directory.  This is useful if one
is merging changes back into a trunk that came from a branch of the
If the revision range is not specified, then check if the source
of merges is a branch of the directory being init'ed.

author: hwright
msg: Client library wc->wc copy/move refactoring.  Copy and adjust the helper
function for moves and copies.  Specialize the helper functions, one for moves
(do_wc_to_wc_copies):  Edit out the sections which are not relevant to copy
(do_wc_to_wc_moves):  New.  Largely copied from do_wc_to_wc_copies(), with
only the sections relevent to moves kept.
(wc_to_wc_copy):  Call the appropriate helper function, based on whether the
operation is a move or a copy.
